Package camzup.kotlin

Class KtMat4

java.lang.Object
camzup.core.Mat4
camzup.kotlin.KtMat4
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<KtVec4>
public class KtMat4
extends Mat4
implements java.lang.Iterable<KtVec4>
Provides Kotlin operator overloading support for four dimensional matrices.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  KtMat4.M4Iterator
    An iterator, which allows a matrix's components to be accessed in an enhanced for loop.

      The default constructor. Creates an identity matrix.

    • get

      public KtVec4 get​(int j)
      Gets a column vector from this matrix. For interoperability with Kotlin: b = a[i] .

      j - the column index
      Returns:
      the column vector

      Returns:
      the iterator

    • minus

      public KtMat4 minus​(Mat4 b)
      Returns a new matrix with the subtraction of the right operand from the instance. For interoperability with Kotlin: a - b . Does not mutate the matrix in place.
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand
      Returns:
      the subtraction

    • minusAssign

      public void minusAssign​(Mat4 b)
      Subtracts the right operand from the instance (mutates the matrix in place). For interoperability with Kotlin: a -= b .
      Parameters:
      b - the right operand

    • not

      public KtMat4 not()
      Returns a new matrix with the boolean opposite of the instance. For interoperability with Kotlin: !a . Does not mutate the matrix in place.
      Returns:
      the opposite matrix
